column2: ENGLISH
[From.GetTitledName] have died leaving you, [From.GetHerHis] [GetFromRelation], [From.GetHerHis] most prized possessions.
[From.GetSheHe] left this world too soon.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] have some possessions that doesn't befit [From.GetHerHis] positions as a prisoner, [From.GetSheHe] should be relieved of them.
What do we have here?
[Root.GetTitledName] already owns a Gwyhyr sword
[Root.GetTitledName] already owns a Nehalenia's Mirror
On second thought [From.GetSheHe] can keep them.
One of the [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] possessions was a Gwyhyr sword, but I already own one myself. What to do with it?
It will fetch a good price.
I will give it some relative.
Maybe [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledName] will be able to put it to use.
One of the [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] possessions was a Nehalenia's Mirror, but I already own one myself. What to do with it?
It will fetch a good price.
I will give it some relative.
It will make a fine gift for [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName].

[From.GetTitledName], a courtier of yours, is in possession of a Gwyhyr sword. Having decide that you are more worthy to own such a splendid sword [From.GetSheHe] offered to sell it to you for a small compenesation.
Of course I will buy it.
I have no need for it.
A treveling merchant presents himself to you, he offers you to buy many rare good among whom there is a Gwyhyr sword. The merchant is willing to sell the sword, although for a heafty sum.
Of course I will buy it.
I have no need for it.
The Gwyhr sword you recently bought turned out to be fake. After one swing the sword broke appart.
Damn, I have been cheated.
